title: Thunderscape Battlemage
text: Kicker  and/or  (You may pay an additional  and/or  as you cast this spell.)When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, target player discards two cards.When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, destroy target enchantment.
expansion: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
